    • Uses of Text in com.ibm.avatar.api

      Methods in com.ibm.avatar.api that return types with arguments of type Text 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldGetter<Text> DocReader.getLabelAcc()
      Deprecated. 
      As of v2.1.1, use DocReader.getDocSchema() to get the document schema and then use AbstractTupleSchema.spanAcc(String) with parameter "label" to get the label field accessor.
      FieldGetter<Text> DocReader.getTextAcc()
      Deprecated. 
      As of v2.1.1, use DocReader.getDocSchema() to get the document schema and then use AbstractTupleSchema.spanAcc(String) with parameter "text" to get the text field accessor.
